thread.title: Will Appeal to Most Travellers
thread.title_full: Will Appeal to Most Travellers - Review of HGU New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: LLfromNYC
title: Will Appeal to Most Travellers
text:
HGU is well-located, on a block between the subway and the bus. The lobby and rooms are modern with a good design aesthetic. Also worth noting, the Bigelow bath products and Dean & DeLuca snacks in the mini-bar. Just be careful not to book a room on the alley if you sleep with the windows open. The vents are noisy.
Room Tip: Avoid the rooms on the alley if you sleep with the windows open. See more room tips
